NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Attractions and column Spending Types is the flow between 7880 and 18794? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Business to node Theme Park and from node Dining to node Africa, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Budget Hotel to node Business, from node Budget Hotel to node Leisure, and from node Leisure to node Hiking Trail, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Travel Purposes of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Boutique Hotel to target node North America? Please list all node labels along this path.
